item.description:
Rout Pak 1 is a re-release of previously released Rout Report scenarios by Critical Hit, Inc. It includes eight scenarios:

RP #1 Morning in Mouen - German infantry with tank support must dislodge British infantry outside Caen during the Battle for Normandy (1944).

RP #2 The Glory Road - Japanese tanks and motorized infantry must force their way across a bridge defended by elements of the 11th Indian Division during the Malayan Campaign (1941).

RP #3 Fire and Rain - Scottish Fusiliers clash with Hitler Youth during the Battle for Normandy (1944) as the Scottish attempt to dig the Germans out of the bocage with the support of a flame throwing Crocodile.

RP #4 Piats and Panthers - British infantry armed with anti-tank guns and piats have to hold off six German Panther tanks during the early days of the Battle for Normandy (1944).

RP #5 Another Balaclava - British lend lease armor attempts to neutralize dug in German guns during the Second Battle of El Alamein (1942).

RP #6 Slam Dance - A swirling urban melee ensues as British paratroopers enroute to the Arnhem bridge, must deal with a hastily assembled German blocking force during Operation Market Garden (1944)

RP #7 No Quarter - Canadian infantry attempt to clear the bocage of Hitler Youth during the early days of the Battle for Normandy (1944).

RP #8 Victoria Cross - A Japanese roadblock has cut the retreat path of an Australian infantry company that is protecting an artillery battery. These mixed elements must clear the roadblock to continue the retreat towards Singapore during the Malayan Campaign (1942).

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
